fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Outsider: You will appear to not win with Order. 
- Executioner: For every player you Kill, draw 1 satcheled card.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Mark: Choose a player. The next attacking card to be played this phase will target them instead. [3 uses, 2 CD] 
- Rage: Gain a non-special card of your choice. [3 uses, 2 CD]
- Steamroll: Deal 1 HP Unblockable damage to a player at the end of the phase. Gain a use every 3 players you outlive. [1 use, 2 CD, Recharging, 0/3]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill X Players by the end of the Execution event. (X = 2 + Players/5, Rounded)
